traits.name: Demonic Restoration
traits.description: If the nalfeshnee dies outside the Abyss, its body dissolves into ichor, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Abyss.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The nalfeshnee has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The nalfeshnee makes three Rend attacks.

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +10, reach 10 ft. Hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) Slashing damage plus 11 (2d10) Force damage.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.description: The nalfeshnee teleports up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

bonus_actions.name: Horror Nimbus
bonus_actions.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 15, each creature in a 15-foot Emanation originating from the nalfeshnee. Failure: 28 (8d6) Psychic damage, and the target has the Frightened condition for 1 minute, until it takes damage, or until it ends its turn with the nalfeshnee out of line of sight.
